titles.title: A bill for the relief of Angel Maldonado-Valverde, Lusila Delgado de Maldonado, Francisco Maldonado-Delgado, Dora Luz Maldonado-Delgado and Jose Luis Maldonado-Delgado.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.

bill.summary: 1/8/1987--Introduced. Declares five named individuals to have been lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
